//Maximum Bipartite Matching
#include<iostream>
#include<cstdio>
#include<algorithm>
#include<vector>
#include<map>
#include<queue>
#include<utility>
#include<cstring>
#include<cmath>
#define LL long long int
#define mod 1000000007
#define vi vector<int>
#define vvi vector < vi >
#define pii pair<int,int>
#define all(c) c.begin(),c.end()
#define sf(n) scanf("%d",&n);
#define mem(a,val) memset(a,val,sizeof(a))
#define pb push_back
#define f first
#define s second
using namespace std;
bool gr[105][105];
bool vis[105];
int match[105];
int n;
bool bpm(int u)
{  for(int v=0;v<n;v++)
   if(gr[u][v])
   {  if(vis[v])
        continue;
      vis[v]=true;
      if(match[v]<0||bpm(match[v]))
	  {	  match[v]=u;
	  	  return true;
   	  }
	}
   return false;
}
int main()
{  int t;
   sf(n);
   mem(match,-1);
   sf(t);
   while(t--)
   {  int x,y;
      sf(x);sf(y);
      gr[x-1][y-1]=true;
   }
   int cnt=0;
   for(int u=0;u<n;u++)
   {  mem(vis,0);
      if(bpm(u))
        cnt++;
   }
   printf("%d\n",cnt);
   return 0;
}
